attributes.action: Offer UCAS points for holding a driving licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that there should be an amount of UCAS points (probably 20) which should be given to individuals if they have a full driving licence. UCAS already offers points for such accomplishments as achieving a certain level of musical proficiency and we believe it is unfair that such a necessary skill for attaining a job goes unrewarded when someone who can play a guitar at advanced level receives points for a skill which often has no bearing on suitability for a job.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
